experience.title: Marketing Associate
experience.description: Project LEO: Increased the monthly GMV by 150% and the number of transacting agents by 100%.Through the successful implementation of marketing strategies which included social media, email, webinars, paid social and content marketing campaigns- Successfully boosted business for 1000+ Travel Agents through strategic support in establishing, maintaining, and expanding their online presence- By running paid ads on Facebook and creating engaging content to educate them through social media, email marketing, & other marketing channels- Assisted in marketing, organizing, & coordinating logistics for executing Asia’s biggest trade shows, like SATTE & OTM, to promote the company & its services

positions.subtitle: Commerce Society, Hans Raj College
positions.description: Overall in charge of the largest department of the college constituting 1000+ students. Leading a diverse team of 60+ students to disseminate Finance, Entrepreneurial, and Marketing insights and impart leadership and organizational skills. Administrating 8 cross-functional teams and ensuring smooth execution and organization of all the events of the department. Managing Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter accounts with 1200+ followers and responsible for organizing webinars, workshops, and competitions to cater to the value addition of all partakers.

positions.subtitle: Commerce Society, Hans Raj College
positions.description: Headed a team of 6 members and developed numerous marketing programs including posters, infographics, presentations, brochures, proposals, videos, and gif animations for various media, to promote 5 flagship events and 10+ workshops (2000+ partakers). experience.title: Business Development Associate
experience.description: Overall, in charge of one of the most crucial projects at the Urban company which involves working on a supply-centric project by engaging with professionals from PAN India and completing the given targets. Interacting with service professionals and solving their problems on daily basis. Responsible for resolving daily operational challenges and managing training dashboards & sheets. Aligned 2500+ professionals in the AC category with over a 90% accuracy rate. Working closely with the senior manager to ensure smooth training procedures by managing operations and logistics.
